lead_paragraph: Jurors were shown testimony that Bill Baroni, a defendant along with Bridget Anne Kelly, gave to the State Legislature months after the lanes leading to the George Washington Bridge were shut.

headline.print_headline: Prosecution Rests Case Against 2 Christie Aides
headline.main: Prosecutors Rest Case Against 2 Ex-Christie Aides in Lane-Closing Trial

snippet: Jurors were shown testimony that Bill Baroni, a defendant along with Bridget Anne Kelly, gave to the State Legislature months after the lanes leading to the George Washington Bridge were shut....
abstract: Federal prosecutors rest their case against Bill Baroni and Bridget Anne Kelly, former aides to New Jersey Gov Chris Christie, in George Washington Bridge lane-closing trial; display to jurors email Kelly deleted and testimony Baroni gave to State Legislature months after incident.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
